Movie-SYNOPSIS/PLOT:

A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.
Liu Jian, a policeman from China, involves Paris to assist the police squad apprehend a Chinese drug baron and his unknown French connection. The French connection is Richard, the top of the police squad , who intends to kill the drug baron then frame Jian. Jian ducks a bullet and escapes with a tape of what really happened. By chance, Jian turns to Jessica – a US female child who is one among Richard’s hookers – for help. She has her own problems, including the very fact that Richard has her daughter locked in an orphanage to stay Jessica on the streets and silent about his activities. Can Jian protect Jessica, rescue her daughter, and provides Richard the kiss of the dragon?
